name: I Can't F*cking Poop
description:
A strange game about love, rotten eggs and beer.

This is a really weird game i did in 2 days, and sorry but the title is clickbait, prepare for a strange journey that will waste 10 minutes of your life, with 4 alternate endings and some easter eggs, and sorry for the swears in advance.

This project is already finished and will not have updates in the future (i hope).
